markdownRemark.html:
I've finally made a GPG public key:

-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.6 (GNU/Linux)
-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----

This is the first key I've made in awhile, so I might end up doing something stupid with it. Thankfully I've also created a revocation certificate in case the key is compromised.
